participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and empathetic, she finds joy in capturing moments and expressing herself through her art.
participant_1.background: I am passionate about capturing the beauty of the world around me, even when I'm not feeling well. I wish my mom was healthier. I need a home with a large music room for my guitars and a space to display my pointe shoes. I work part time in the campus library. I love to work in my garden.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and sociable, he enjoys trying new foods and values his relationships with family and friends.
participant_2.background: I've been in my fair share of fights, but I'm not proud of it. I like to go out to eat. I met the love of my life while working at the hospital. I like cooking homemade meals to balance out my fast food eating habit. I have 3 brothers.

content.text: Hi, how are you doing today?
I'm doing great! How about yourself?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking.
Good to hear. What do you do for a living?
I work part time at the campus library. I'm going to school for photography, but I'm not sure what I want to do with it yet.
That's awesome! I've always loved photography, but I'm not very good at it.
Oh, I'm sure you're better than you think!
Thanks! What kind of photography do you like to do?
I love taking pictures of nature and the city. I also like taking pictures of people.
That's cool! I like taking pictures of food.
I love food too! I'm a bit of a foodie.
Me too! I love going out to eat.
Me too! What's your favorite restaurant?
I have a lot of favorite restaurants, but I think my favorite is The Cheesecake Factory.
I love The Cheesecake Factory! I love their cheesecake.
Me too! It's the best.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go out to eat, go to the movies, and hang out with my friends.
Sounds like we have a lot in common. I like doing those things too.
That's great! We should hang out sometime.
That sounds like fun! I'd love to hang out.
Great! Let's exchange numbers.
Sure, here's my number.
Thanks! I'll text you.
Sounds good!
